DOC.brief_summary: Phase 4 study evaluate routine patient complete assessment ( RAPID3 ) compare physician complete assessment ( CDAI ) predict treatment success subject moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Assessment Tools Predicting Treatment Success Cimzia Rheumatoid Arthritis Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: RA0064 Phase 4 , multicenter , randomize , 52-week study . All eligible subject receive open label Cimzia 400 mg Weeks 0 , 2 4 , follow Cimzia 200 mg every 2 week Weeks 6 50 treatment moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis . All subject assess use 2 assessment tool : subject-based Routine Assessment Patient Index ( RAPID3 ) investigator-based Clinical Disease Activity Index ( CDAI )
